scripts.text:
insert all 
INTO SAPSR3.YMPCT_NSA_GR(MANDT,CHARG,MATNR_AIM,TIMESTAMP,MATNR_ACH,QUANTITY,MEINS,SHIFT,STATUS,REC_TYPE,INTER_ID,UDATE,UTIME,USERID,Z_CUT_PER_TON,Z_LINK_PER_TON,Z_BEND_PER_TON,Z_STANDARD,Z_MILL_SOURCE) VALUES (600,'B23NH04720','SBB_A501_160','2023-10-20-00.20.05.104465','SBB_A501_160  ',76875.000,'KG','3','A','S',104,'00000000','000000','BGDJOBS',0,0,0,'SS2:Part2:1999','NSH')
INTO SAPSR3.YMPCT_NSA_GR(MANDT,CHARG,MATNR_AIM,TIMESTAMP,MATNR_ACH,QUANTITY,MEINS,SHIFT,STATUS,REC_TYPE,INTER_ID,UDATE,UTIME,USERID,Z_CUT_PER_TON,Z_LINK_PER_TON,Z_BEND_PER_TON,Z_STANDARD,Z_MILL_SOURCE) VALUES (600,'C23NH05927','SCF_19SX_100','2023-10-19-23:18:08.376000','SCF_19SX_100',77408.000,'KG','E','A','S',104,'00000000','000000','BGDJOBS',0,0,0,'1019S','NSH')
SELECT 1 FROM dual;

SELECT LOT_NO FROM SAP_RESULTS_HDR a left join (select distinct charg,ach_matl_no,status from t_nsa_gr) b 
  on a.charg=b.charg where a.status='A' and b.status in('P','Y','E')

SELECT LOT_NO FROM SAP_RESULTS_HDR a left join (select distinct fld_GR_batch_id,fld_gr_aim_matl_no from [NSDB11STS].[STS].dbo.tbl_sts_dns_GR where fld_gr_aim_matl_no like 'FP%') b 
 on a.charg=b.fld_GR_batch_id and a.MATL_NO=b.fld_gr_aim_matl_no 
 where a.status='A' and a.MATL_NO like 'FP%'

DECLARE @lcReProcessDate AS VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT LOT_NO FROM SAP_RESULTS_HDR WHERE 
  CONVERT(VARCHAR(25), ID_MESSAGE, 126) LIKE @lcReProcessDate and status='E'

DECLARE @lcLotNo AS VARCHAR(MAX)
INSERT INTO T_HDR_T
			select DISTINCT a.MANDT,a.LOT_NO,
		    (CASE WHEN a.MATL_NO like 'FP%' THEN a.MATL_NO ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM((b.ach_MATL_NO))) END) as MATL_NO,
			a.CHARG as BATCH_NO,a.STOR_LOC,a.PLANT,a.TOT_ELEM,' ' as INSP_LOT_NO,a.USER_ID,a.TEST_DATE,a.TEST_TIME,'A' as STATUS,a.INTERFACE_ID as INTER_ID,a.ID_MESSAGE as TIMESTAMP,' ' as ERROR_CD,' ' as PROC_TS,' ' as REC_TYPE,' ' as USERID,'00000000' as UDATE,'000000' as UTIME
			from SAP_RESULTS_HDR a left join (select distinct charg,ach_matl_no,status from t_nsa_gr) b on a.charg=b.charg where a.LOT_NO=@lcLotNo;
